name: Undead World: Hero Survival
description:
TAKE ON THE ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE
Get ready for adventure in the Undead World in this new survival RPG! Collect, equip, and upgrade your squad of heroes for battle against the roving hordes of zombies with fearsome abilities. New players start with 1,000 Diamonds!

MANAGE YOUR HEROES
You determine how to survive the zombie apocalypse!
-Recruit strong heroes from four different factions through the gacha collecting system
-Level up your favorites to create a powerhouse team
-Rank up your strong heroes to Legendary + or Unique +

COLLECT REWARDS
Gather loot even while you’re AFK!
-Idle Rewards fill up for you to collect throughout the day
-Instant Rewards grant 2 hours’ worth of Idle Rewards for immediate resources
-After each battle or quest, you’ll receive even more resources to help aid in your survival!

EXPLORE THE VARIETY OF GAME MODES
-Play through Midtown to try out strong heroes and receive rewards
-Battle PvP in the Arena to fight other Undead World players
-Enter the gauntlet mode on the Zombie Express to see how long you can survive

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
-Add friends to play with hired mercenaries and to send and receive Hearts to recruit heroes
-Join a Guild to raid with members and take down epic bosses
-Help your friends and guild members at the Guard Tower for special rewards
